macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Consumer Inflation Stalls at 2.7% y/y, Core at 2.6% y/y Four-Year Low
items.summary: December US CPI matched estimates at 2.7% y/y (0.3% m/m), with core inflation unchanged at 2.6% y/y (0.2% m/m), stabilizing at a four-year low. USD index rose 0.3% amid Fed independence concerns from DOJ probe into Chair Powell and upcoming Supreme Court tariff decision.

items.title: USD/JPY Surges Above 159, Japan Officials Warn of Intervention
items.summary: USD/JPY hit highest since July 2024 above 159, boosting Japan's Topix index 2.4% to record high via weak yen aiding exporters. Japanese officials issue verbal warnings, with thin liquidity during US holidays as potential intervention window.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Decline: Dow -0.8%, S&P -13 pts to 6963, Nasdaq -24 pts
items.summary: Dow shed 398 points (0.8%) to 49,191.99; S&P ended down 13 points at 6963 with 52% stocks rising, flat over two days; Nasdaq down 24 points. Outlook remains bullish with dips likely amid bank earnings.

items.title: USD Faces Downside Pressure, Eyes 98.6 Support; USD/CAD Risk from Oil Prices
items.summary: USD under pressure from stabilizing inflation and Fed concerns, testing 100-day MA at 98.6. USD/CAD downside amid higher oil prices, with focus shifting to US producer inflation and retail sales.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Surges Past $95,000 Amid Broad Crypto Rally
items.summary: Bitcoin traded above $95,500 and Ethereum held above $3,300 as markets reacted to cooling U.S. inflation data, rate-cut expectations, and regulatory progress, lifting total crypto market cap toward $3.25 trillion.[1][2]

items.title: CLARITY Act Gains Momentum in U.S. Congress
items.summary: Lawmakers advanced the Digital Asset Market Clarity Act of 2025, aimed at clarifying regulatory roles between the SEC and CFTC, boosting crypto market sentiment and supporting price gains.[1]

items.title: Kalshi Launches Ecosystem Hub with Solana and Base
items.summary: U.S.-regulated prediction market exchange Kalshi debuted KalshiEco Hub in partnership with Solana and Coinbase-backed Base, offering grants and support for builders while enabling native SOL and USDC deposits.[2]

items.title: Crypto Markets Rebound with 3-8% Gains Across Sectors
items.summary: Most crypto sectors posted gains of 3% to 8% over the past 24 hours as risk appetite improved, driven by positive macro and regulatory signals.[3]

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: U.S. Army Launches New AI/ML Officer Career Pathway
items.summary: The U.S. Army has introduced the 49B AI/ML Officer specialization for officers, with the first group selected via the Volunteer Transfer Incentive Program starting January 2026. This initiative aims to build in-house experts for integrating AI and ML in battlefield decision-making, logistics, and autonomous systems.
items.source: US Federal News Bureau / CDO Magazine

items.title: Machine Learning Model Identifies Country-Specific Cancer Survival Drivers
items.summary: Researchers developed an AI model analyzing data from 185 countries to pinpoint key factors like health systems and radiotherapy access affecting cancer mortality-to-incidence ratios. The model uses SHAP explanations to provide actionable insights for global policymakers.

items.title: Floating Fleet AI Hires Optimization Expert Norbert Lingaya
items.summary: Floating Fleet AI, a provider of AI solutions for private aviation, added Norbert Lingaya, an expert in operations research, to enhance its planning and scheduling optimization capabilities for complex aviation challenges.

items.title: Wasabi Technologies Raises $70M for AI Storage Infrastructure
items.summary: Cloud storage provider Wasabi secured $70 million in equity funding, totaling over $600 million raised, to advance AI infrastructure and storage solutions.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Meta Lays Off 1,500 in Reality Labs, Closes Multiple VR Game Studios
items.summary: Meta is cutting 10% of its Reality Labs staff, around 1,500 jobs, and closing first-party VR studios including Armature Studios, Sanzaru Games, Twisted Pixel, and Within, which developed games like Deadpool VR and Asgard's Wrath 2. A company-wide meeting is scheduled for January 14, 2026, to discuss the changes.

items.title: Ubisoft Lays Off Staff at Abu Dhabi Studio
items.summary: Ubisoft has cut several roles at its Abu Dhabi studio over the past month, following recent studio closures amid ongoing industry challenges.

items.title: IGT Expands Andy Hendrickson's Role to Chief Product & Technology Officer
items.summary: International Game Technology (IGT) has promoted Andy Hendrickson to Chief Product & Technology Officer, expanding his executive responsibilities within the company.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Polygon Labs Acquires Coinme and Sequence for $250 Million
items.summary: Polygon Labs, a blockchain developer, bought cash-to-crypto firm Coinme and wallet infrastructure company Sequence for $250 million to bolster competition with Stripe in crypto payments.

items.title: LAUNCH Acquires JMC Aviation to Create Global Aviation Tech Leader
items.summary: LAUNCH Technical Workforce Solutions acquired JMC Aviation, combining U.S. leadership with international presence to offer expanded technical services in aerospace, MRO, and workforce solutions worldwide.

items.title: TEI Partners with Paren for Advanced EV Charging Data Analytics
items.summary: The Transportation Energy Institute partnered exclusively with EV charging data platform Paren to provide market insights, performance benchmarking, and analytics for charging operators, retailers, and OEMs.
